desc: Buy online , Authentic & Organically grown in the Uttarakhand hills- Cereals/ Millets - Red Rice, Madua, Bhang seeds,Bhangjeera, Jhangoora; Flavoured Salts (Sil Pisi Noon); Pulses - Bhatt, Gehat, Munsiyari rajma; Spices/ Condiments - Kala jeera, Timur, Gandrayani, Jamboo, Jakhia; Herbs; Preserves; Badi & Mangori.

layout.text: Organically produced & cultivated with crystal clear waters of the Himalayan Rivers, our natural products are sure to boost your daily dose of nutrition.
